title: Melanophylla
text:
Melanophylla is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="flowering%20plant">flowering plant</a>s <a href="endemic%20%28ecology%29">endemic</a> to <a href="Madagascar">Madagascar</a>. The genus contains seven <a href="species">species</a> of small trees and shrubs.
Under the <a href="APG%20II%20system">APG II system</a> this genus was placed alone in family Melanophyllaceae, but with the rider that "[s]ome of the families are monogeneric and could possibly be merged when well-supported sister-group relationships have been established." In 2004, such a relationship was established between "Melanophylla", "<a href="Aralidium">Aralidium</a>" and "<a href="Torricellia">Torricellia</a>", resulting in the transfer of the first two of these genera into <a href="Torricelliaceae">Torricelliaceae</a>.
